about_the_game:
Bells & Whistles is a Dimension Pro Expansion Pack with holiday music inspired instruments sounds including;
  • Bells (Rope Bells, Sleigh Bells, Bell Trees, Bell Shakers)
  • Choirs
  • Harpsichords
  • Organs
  • Snare Drums
  • Cymbals
  • Strings

Plus a bunch of extra “whistles” (like a Nylon String Guitar, Grand Piano, Bass Drum, and a Double Bass).

All sounds designed exclusively for Cakewalk by Tim Swartz of Digital Sound Factory. Includes over 50 programs guaranteed to put you in the holiday spirit!

Note: This pack was originally designed for Dimension Pro.
It also works with:
  • Rapture Session
  • Rapture Pro
  • Dimension LE

name: Cakewalk - Dimension Pro Holiday Pack: Bells & Whistles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Intel or AMD multi-core processor
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080+ recommended)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended

short_description: Bells & Whistles is a Dimension Pro Expansion Pack with holiday music inspired instruments sounds.
